SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into operation_log (flight_type, flight_number, flight_date, operation_detail, `attributes`, flight_io, operation_time, operation_type, operation_id, dept_id) values (#{flightType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flightNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flightDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{operationDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attributes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flightIo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update operation_log set flight_type = #{flightType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flight_number = #{flightNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flight_date = #{flightDate,jdbcType=DATE}, operation_detail = #{operationDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `attributes` = #{attributes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flight_io = #{flightIo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operation_time = #{operationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, operation_type = #{operationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operation_id = #{operationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, flight_type, flight_number, flight_date, operation_detail, `attributes`, flight_io, operation_time, operation_type, operation_id, dept_id from operation_log where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, flight_type, flight_number, flight_date, operation_detail, `attributes`, flight_io, operation_time, operation_type, operation_id, dept_id from operation_log
